name: Plantwise Factsheet Library app
description: The Plantwise Factsheet Library app is used by agricultural service providers to access actionable pest management information in the field.

repositories.name: main
repositories.url: https://api.cabi.org/FactsheetAdmin/pw/factsheets/KE, https://api.cabi.org/FactsheetAdmin/pw/factsheets/GH, etc with many other country codes (not just KE and GH).

sdgs.relevance: The actionable plant health information delivered through the Plantwise Factsheet Library app supports decision making by farmers and agricultural service providers. The safe and effective management of crop pests will reduce crop losses and ensure they are growing more and safer food.

openlicenses.openLicenseEvidenceURLs: A PDF version of one of the factsheets which is provided through the open API and delivered through the app - https://plantwiseplusknowledgebank.org/doi/epdf/10.1079/pwkb.20177800753

clearOwnership.clearOwnershipURL:
Content is owned by CABI as shown here - https://plantwiseplusknowledgebank.org/doi/epdf/10.1079/pwkb.20177800753 
The API is owned and hosted by CABI. 
The app is also owned by CABI - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.cabi.pfff&hl=en_GB&gl=US

documentation:
Most Factsheet Library app information is here -  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.cabi.pfff&hl=en_GB&gl=US 
API info is here - https://api.cabi.org/FactsheetAdmin/swagger/ui/index#/ 
Information on the content itself (PFFFs and PMDGs) - https://plantwiseplusknowledgebank.org/using-the-pwkb
openStandards:
available through an API is creative commons. 
The app is open access.
bestPractices:
Principles For Digital Development 
Agile development 
User Centred Design
Azure
FAIR Data Principles

dataPrivacySecurity.collectsPII: PII data is NOT collected NOT stored and NOT distributed.

userContent.contentManagement: Content is NOT collected NOT stored and NOT distributed.

NonPII.nonPIIAccessMechanism: The use of the app generates analytics data which can be downloaded in CSV formats from Google analytics.

deploymentCountriesDepartments: Many extension staff in Ministries of Agriculture in the above countries
otherDeploymentOrganisations: The app is used by agricultural service providers
including government extension and agro-input dealers
